name: Grand Stratospheric
description:
Grand Stratospheric is a game about building railroads up high, refining ores and running out of fuel.

Made from scratch for XJam2016 in slightly less than 2 weeks. Somewhat rough around the edges.

Music by Jazz Mickle (http://www.jmickle.com/) and Souleye (http://souleye.se/), used with the authors already acknowledging the theft.

Graphics by Googer.

Everything else by me.

Controls: mouse & mouse scrollwheel
